lines.villain:
Oh, a brave little speck;
a whispering spark amidst this sinking despair,
a mix of defiance and senseless hot air.
I see you, small thing;
so finite, so pointless, so fated to die –
to be snuffed –
that the snuffer might very well as well be I.

replies.reply:
I’ll suffer all night,
 if the cause is right.

Snuff as you like, if you’re the king,
 if death is all you have to bring.

Sad thing you must be,
 making a crisis from cosmic whimsy.

your sight’s what brought you by to my side.
 My light’s so bright it’s captivating.

I’m a string, a fraying plaything,
 but even fleeting, a life’s a life.

Seeing me
 and charging a spark with theft of the dark..

Observe the world that I’m creating;
try me and fight, but try as you might, I’m not the kind to lose my shine.

You can’t unmake that I was alive,
can’t unhear a bell that’s ringing.

You're merely keeping a guard
to guard your heart against company.
